Detailed Description

Author: Jaakko Luttinen ProjectileSustaining is a class for projectiles that create the effect of sustained fire. In fact, the actual projectile is kept unmoved with no interaction and it will launch some new projectiles with given intervals and a slight dispersion.

price Price of the projectile.
ammunition The projectiles to shoot.
count Number of projectiles to shoot.
delay Time delay between two shots.
dispersingAngle The angle of dispersion to give some unaccuracy.
